Row.Text: We must continue promoting our "Bolivarian Revolution" policies and denounce the policies of our enemies. The best way to do this is naturally by broadcasting a talk show, hosted by no other than our very own presidente, you! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Venezuela. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have chosen an Ideology. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- {1_sJFDLCDependendCost} [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_iNumCulture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Broadcast Tower in every City. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Social Policies cost 10% less Culture.

We must continue promoting our "Bolivarian Revolution" policies and denounce the policies of our enemies. The best way to do this is naturally by broadcasting a talk show, hosted by no other than our very own presidente, you! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Broadcast Tower in every City. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Social Policies cost 10% less Culture
The Venezuelan President, Hugo Chávez, has recently become even more adored and beloved by his people. This is largely due to the fact that he has taken on the role as a talk show host!

It is of utmost importance that we together with our most trusted allies found an organization based on the ideology of the great Simón Bolívar, associated with socialist and social democratic governments wishing to consolidate regional economic integration based on a vision of social welfare, bartering and mutual economic aid! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Venezuela. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Declaration of Friendship with another major Civilization. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units receive +25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when starting their turn in territory of a friendly or allied City-State.

It is of utmost importance that we together with our most trusted allies found an organization based on the ideology of the great Simón Bolívar, associated with socialist and social democratic governments wishing to consolidate regional economic integration based on a vision of social welfare, bartering and mutual economic aid! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units receive +25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when starting their turn in territory of a friendly or allied City-State.
+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for having started the turn in territory of a friendly or allied City-State.
